articles.description: Reaction as Arsenal beat Manchester United to take the Premier League title-race to the final week, plus latest football news and build-up to the week's decisive matches.
articles.title: Reaction: Premier League title-race goes to final week as Arsenal win at Man Utd

articles.description: Listen to BBC radio commentaries and follow live text coverage of day four of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Scores, updates & commentary of day four

articles.description: No-one could have envisaged that 10 years on from his US PGA Championship win at Valhalla we have not seen Rory McIlroy add to his major tally, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy's US PGA Championship tilt at Valhalla buoyed by Quail Hollow victory

articles.description: Two matches at the Italian Open in Rome were suspended following a protest by climate activists.
articles.title: Climate protesters interrupt two Italian Open matches in Rome

articles.description: Match of the Day 2 pundit Martin Keown says Arsenal have ticked off "a checklist of what it takes to be champions" after their win at Manchester United.
articles.title: Manchester United 0-1 Arsenal: 'Arsenal have ticked off the checklist of champions' - Martin Keown

articles.description: The Indiana Pacers demolish the New York Knicks to tie their NBA play-off series at 2-2.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Indiana Pacers beat New York Knicks to level series

articles.description: New Zealand captain Sam Cane will retire from international rugby at the end of 2024 after signing a three-year deal with Japanese side Suntory Sungoliath.
articles.title: Sam Cane: New Zealand captain to retire from international game

articles.description: Record-breaking striker Vivianne Miedema will leave Arsenal at the end of the season after seven years.
articles.title: Vivianne Miedema: Striker to leave Arsenal at end of WSL season

articles.description: The stormy weather at Old Trafford on Sunday provided a metaphor for Manchester United's season as they suffered their 14th league defeat of the season at home to Arsenal.
articles.title: 'So bad' - is this Man Utd team really 'one of the worst ever'?

articles.description: Rob Cross rallies after Luke Humphries' nine-dart finish to win the Baltic Sea Darts Open and his second European Tour title.
articles.title: PDC: Rob Cross beats Luke Humphries to win Baltic Sea Darts Open
